entry.title: How to train your alpha werewolf
entry.summary:
Author: everyonelovesLaurence

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 129,874Chapters: 22/29Kudos: 256

Summary: Derek Hale has always known two things about himself: He's not good at making people like him, and he's going to be his sister's second for the Sacramento pack. But when a random assignment leads him to be the new alpha of Beacon Hills, dealing with far too big shoes to fill and a new pack orphan that everyone listens to far more than they do him, he thinks it's his big chance to finally prove his worth to his mother. Besides, it's not forever, is it?Stiles Stilinski has always known two things about himself, too: Being the son of the alpha is a Big Job, and it's his to do, and one day, his mate will be the next alpha of his mother's pack. But when his parents are murdered, and some growly man with expressive eyebrows unwillingly takes her place, he's got two choices: keep glaring at Derek or teach him to man up. At least until he's found a replacement. How long could that take?This is a story about building a pack, finding a home and cuddling with a dog. It's mostly about the dog.

entry.title: A Scot of His Soul
entry.summary:
Author: Nightowl_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,553Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: The decision to vacation in Scotland was entirely Derek's. Stiles had argued for beaches, sun, and cocktails, but how could he say no to the man he loved—He doesn't expect the trip to be actually enjoyable. And he definitely doesn't expect the potent combination of Derek's unwavering enthusiasm, breathtaking scenery, and a traditionally worn kilt to be quite so... distracting. As it turns out, a little historical exploration can lead to a lot of illicit fun in ruined castle towers and on the shores of secluded lochs. Or: The one where Derek's deep-seated love for all things Scottish awakens something new in Stiles, kilts are proven to be the ultimate weapon of seduction, and a beach holiday is very, very forgotten.

entry.title: The Wolf at Winter’s Door
entry.summary:
Author: DarkInsanity (Stereklenidus)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,738Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 14

Summary: Winter is closing in on the Hale valley when Derek—an exiled alpha turned recluse—finds a half-frozen omega and a baby in the snow outside his cottage. He should have left them to the storm; he’s learned what kindness costs. But the sound of the infant’s cry, and the scent of something wild and familiar in the omega’s skin, pull at the part of him that still remembers how to protect, how to care, how to love.As the snow deepens and the fire burns low, Derek’s solitude unravels thread by thread.The omega’s name is Stiles—a runaway from a war Derek has long tried to forget. He carries secrets, grief, and a child who isn’t meant to survive the winter.In a world of fading magic, hunters, and ghosts of kingdoms lost to fire, two wounded souls find warmth in each other’s silence.But the past always finds its way through the snow.

entry.title: To Survive a Serial Killer
entry.summary:
Author: DarkScarlette

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 80,961Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 44

Summary: Stiles never planned to stay in Beacon Hills, but something about Derek’s empty loft made it impossible to leave. Now working as a consultant for the Sheriff’s department, he’s drawn into a chilling case. The investigation takes a personal turn when Derek suddenly returns, bloody and broken, with wounds that match the killer’s victims.With Derek back, and no clear idea what they’re up against, the pack is forced to regroup. As Stiles, Scott, Lydia, and the others race to unravel the mystery, old emotions resurface, secrets unravel, and survival becomes anything but guaranteed.Whatever this killer is, it’s not human—and it’s just getting started.

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,185Chapters: 9/15Kudos: 137

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.

entry.title: A Spark of Change
entry.summary:
Author: RaatKiRani

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 130,748Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 702

Summary: “This isn’t what it looks like, “ Fuck, that’s what we’re going with?“What…does it look like?” asks Boyd slowly.“I don’t even know, but it won’t be that.” I can’t afford to move from where I’m trying to hold Derek to this life with t-shirts and sheer spite. “Um…help?”“I’ll call an ambulance.” Boyd reaches for his phone. Isaac is still frozen just past the threshold, silent, like he’s trying not to be noticed.“NO!” I shriek, and like a fucking flash grenade in my panic, I light up blazing silver. Hoh, boy, I’ve gone and done it now. “…Yeah, no, can’t do that.”“W-what…are you?” Lord, that question has gotten a lot less funny.“An environmentalist, apparently. Look, just- please, help me?” I’m solidly crying now. “I’ll tell you anything you want after.”Isaac speaks for the first time. “A-are we hiding a body?”I snort a bit hysterically. “Yeah, no, the bare minimum to unlock that level of friendship is 6 months or a trauma bond.”“I’m qualified then,” Isaac deadpans, because he is a fucking menace like that. “What do you need?”XXXXXXXXXXXLayla, a blind, brown, badass ready to do whatever to protect her friends. The supernaturals make it very hard.

entry.title: Lift My Heart to Your Ear
entry.summary:
Author: ArtaxLivs

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,614Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 63

Summary: Spurned on by a day of binging Harry Potter movies, young Stiles decides to cast a spell to ensure that the person he falls in love with is to impossible to exist.“Why don’t you want to fall in love?” Scott asks when they’re standing in the middle of the backyard, lit only from the light on the back porch since there’s no moon tonight. A new moon, Stiles thinks absently but something in him tells him that new moons are best for new beginnings.“Because loving someone means letting them hurt you, even if they don’t want to, even if they’re…dead,” Stiles replies softly, hoping Scott will understand and not make him talk about how much he misses her, how much Stiles misses him, even though his dad is still alive.

entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 127,811Chapters: 36/36Kudos: 45

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: Copain of the black wolf.
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 196,713Chapters: 24/40Kudos: 829

Summary: A Sterek rewrite of the show, that stays mostly canon compliant in the beginning, shown exclusively through the eyes of Stiles Stilinski, unknown soul mate of Derek Hale.Starts slow emotionally, my first attempt at a story of this degree please be gentle.Stiles grunted softly as he heaved himself onto the roof, his sneakers scuffing against the shingles. Scott—his best friend since forever—wasn’t answering his phone, and Stiles couldn’t wait. There was no way Scott was going to believe what Stiles had just overheard.Keeping low, Stiles crept along the roof toward Scott’s window, his heart racing as the cool night air pressed against his skin. He tried the window, but it wouldn’t budge—it was locked.“Of course it’s locked,” he muttered under his breath, rolling his eyes.Knocking softly on the glass, he leaned in closer, squinting to peer inside. The curtains were drawn, giving him only a hazy, distorted view of the room beyond. “Scott,” he hissed, rapping on the window again. No answer.Suddenly, the curtains shifted, and the window flung open. Scott and Stiles screamed, startling each other.

entry.title: Pure Madness
entry.summary:
Author: Hamahthesith

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,106Chapters: 7/20Kudos: 11

Summary: Stiles could still remember the first time his mother explained the importance of epigenetic memory. In spite of the trauma associated with such genetic continuity, she stressed the importance of remembrance in all of its various forms. He hadn't truly understood until a madness claimed Beacon Hills as it's home. Only he has the genetic continuity, the memories, to free the minds of their hometown. With the occasional assistance of an overbearing sour wolf, oh, and his pack of wolves.
